Abraham "Abie" G. Rubin

Summary

Abie Rubin is a respected and dedicated team-oriented professional. He is a self-taught web developer with experience in Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, Javascript and JQeury. He is an enthusiastic learner.

As confucious says Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.

With this humble approach to learning, Abie has been able to teach himself the fundamentals of web development by participating in Bloc's Full-Stack

Apprenticeship program, and using resources such as EdX courses, codeschool, code academy, railscasts, and documentation.

Previous to learning web-devlopment, Abie has experience as an IT consultant and has a strong interest in the environment and clean tech.

Abie is highly skilled at relationship building and is seeking to use strong technical, decisive leadership and communication skills in his next endeavor.
